docs.text: Welcome Welcome to the Utility Pause Menu script documentation. Discord
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Welcome to the Utility Pause Menu script documentation.
docs.title: Welcome

docs.text: DisableMenus If is true the menus (pause, map, settings) will be disabled. Argument Data Type Nedeed Default Description disable boolean - Example exports["utility_pausemenu"]:DisableMenus(true)
docs.title: DisableMenus

docs.text: If is true the menus (pause, map, settings) will be disabled. Argument Data Type Nedeed Default Description disable boolean - Example exports["utility_pausemenu"]:DisableMenus(true)
docs.title: DisableMenus

docs.text: GetCurrentPauseMenu Return the current pause menu that is being displayed. Returns Data Type Description string "map", "settings", "pause" Example local menu = exports["utility_pausemenu"]:GetCurrentPauseMenu()
docs.title: GetCurrentPauseMenu

docs.text: Return the current pause menu that is being displayed. Returns Data Type Description string "map", "settings", "pause" Example local menu = exports["utility_pausemenu"]:GetCurrentPauseMenu()
docs.title: GetCurrentPauseMenu

docs.text: IsInPause return true if the pause menu its showing Returns Data Type Description boolean Example local inpause = exports["utility_pausemenu"]:IsInPause()
docs.title: IsInPause

docs.text: return true if the pause menu its showing Returns Data Type Description boolean Example local inpause = exports["utility_pausemenu"]:IsInPause()
docs.title: IsInPause

docs.text: IsMenuDisabled Return the current disable state of the menus (pause, map, settings) Returns Data Type Description boolean If true the menus (pause, map, settings) are disabled, if false they are enabled. Example local menuState = exports["utility_pausemenu"]:IsMenuDisabled()
docs.title: IsMenuDisabled

docs.text: Return the current disable state of the menus (pause, map, settings) Returns Data Type Description boolean If true the menus (pause, map, settings) are disabled, if false they are enabled. Example local menuState = exports["utility_pausemenu"]:IsMenuDisabled()
docs.title: IsMenuDisabled

docs.text: OpenBrowserPage Open a browser page, with the given URL. Argument Data Type Nedeed Default Description url string - Example exports["utility_pausemenu"]:OpenBrowserPage("https://google.com")
docs.title: OpenBrowserPage

docs.text: Open a browser page, with the given URL. Argument Data Type Nedeed Default Description url string - Example exports["utility_pausemenu"]:OpenBrowserPage("https://google.com")
docs.title: OpenBrowserPage

docs.text: SetMapMenu Set the map menu to be displayed, this is the menu that is displayed when you click the "MAP" button. Argument Data Type Nedeed Default Description active boolean - Example exports["utility_pausemenu"]:SetMapMenu(true) -- Open the map
docs.title: SetMapMenu

docs.text: Set the map menu to be displayed, this is the menu that is displayed when you click the "MAP" button. Argument Data Type Nedeed Default Description active boolean - Example exports["utility_pausemenu"]:SetMapMenu(true) -- Open the map
docs.title: SetMapMenu

docs.text: SetPauseMenu Set the pause menu to be displayed, this is the menu that is displayed when you click ESC. Argument Data Type Nedeed Default Description active boolean - Example exports["utility_pausemenu"]:SetPauseMenu(true) -- Open the pause menu
docs.title: SetPauseMenu

docs.text: Set the pause menu to be displayed, this is the menu that is displayed when you click ESC. Argument Data Type Nedeed Default Description active boolean - Example exports["utility_pausemenu"]:SetPauseMenu(true) -- Open the pause menu
docs.title: SetPauseMenu

docs.text: SetSettingsMenu Set the settings menu to be displayed, this is the menu that is displayed when you click the "SETTINGS" button. Argument Data Type Nedeed Default Description active boolean - Example exports["utility_pausemenu"]:SetSettingsMenu(true) -- Open the settings menu
docs.title: SetSettingsMenu

docs.text: Set the settings menu to be displayed, this is the menu that is displayed when you click the "SETTINGS" button. Argument Data Type Nedeed Default Description active boolean - Example exports["utility_pausemenu"]:SetSettingsMenu(true) -- Open the settings menu
docs.title: SetSettingsMenu

docs.text: TogglePauseMenu Toggle the pause menu. Argument Data Type Nedeed Default Description active boolean - Example exports["utility_pausemenu"]:TogglePauseMenu() -- Open or close the pause menu
docs.title: TogglePauseMenu

docs.text: Toggle the pause menu. Argument Data Type Nedeed Default Description active boolean - Example exports["utility_pausemenu"]:TogglePauseMenu() -- Open or close the pause menu
docs.title: TogglePauseMenu
